moves.name: Poison Tail
moves.effect: Critical hits land more easily. Has a very small chance of leaving the target poisoned.

moves.name: Race You!
moves.effect: Sharply raises the user’s Speed. Raises the user’s critical-hit rate.

moves.name: Poison Jab
moves.effect: Has a moderate chance of leaving the target poisoned.

passives.name: Antitoxin
passives.description: Prevents the Pokémon from getting poisoned or badly poisoned.

passives.name: Power Reserves 2
passives.description: Powers up moves in a pinch.

passives.name: Critical Strike 1
passives.description: Powers up attacks if they become critical hits.
